attributes.title: 2022 Haval Jolion 1.5T City

attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277079. TAKE A DRIVE ON THE WILD SIDE!!! The Ford Ranger has always been near to the top of the pick-up class in terms of safety. This model achieved a full five-star safety rating. The electric power steering is particularly good for a pick-up in terms of its weight and responsiveness. Safety features include driver and front passenger, front, and seat-side airbags, dynamic stability control, emergency brake assist, hill descent control, hill launch assist, to mention a few. We provide RWC upon delivery and we do a multi-point check on our vehicles for your peace of mind. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply
